article: arthur andersen , the world 's largest accounting firm , has signed a lease with boston properties that would enable the developer to build the last of four office towers at the core of an ##-year-old plan to transform times square from a dowdy and foreboding crossroads into a vibrant , unk entertainment and commercial district .
